title: Edit component type properties
content:
For inherited properties, you can't edit the following fields:

  • Type
  • Name
  • Display Name
  • Description
  • Confidential Data

To edit component type properties

  1. In the left pane of the Sequenced Components area, select the component palette that contains the component type whose properties you want to edit.
  2. Click the component type whose properties you want to edit.
  3. Select the Properties tab.
  4. Click the gear icon for the property and select Edit.
  5. In the Edit Component Type dialog, change properties of the component type. For descriptions of certain fields, see Create component type properties.
  6. Click Save.

Related topics

  • Create component type properties
